content:
# World Water Day 2021

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/world-water-day-2021/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:40:09

World Water Day 2021
March 25, 2021; We start on 10h00 am 
On-line,  MS Teams platform 

World Water Day, held on 22nd March every year since 1993, focuses on  the importance of freshwater. The core focus of World Water Day is to  support the achievement of Sustainable Development Goal 6: water and  sanitation for all by 2030. Source: 
www.un.org
. 

Draft Programme: 
Welcome 
Introduction 
The role and importance of water supply for the user in terms of its  quality and safety. 
Panel discussion on: The importance of water for All 
Discussion 

Participants from: Cuba, Madagascar, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, Poland 

For registration and participation please contact:  
barbara.kapela@agh.edu.pl

Registration deadline: 22.03.2021 

Organizators: 
UNESCO AGH Chair 
World Water Day 2021: What does water mean to you? 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lZ6ZIdIgv2A

by the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO), specialized agency of  the United Nations.
